page.title: 10Kennethmont: Local Climate
page.content: Our local climate is temperate. Summers here are usually warm or cool with a few "hot" spells. Autumns are often cool and dry and sometimes damp. Winter here is always wet and cold.Often we get heavy falls of snow combined with high winds,this combination often leaves roads blocked, sometimes for hours.Sometimes power cables are brought down by the strong winds resulting in power black-outs,and on occasions the school is closed due to severe weather conditions. Spring is very often cold and wet, and Summer tends to arrive late.On the whole we are affected quite considerably by our climatic conditions. Late wet Springs affect the farmers, damp Autumns affect the harvest and during severe storms in Winter we are all affected by blocked roads, power cuts, closed schools,etc.
